nodes.bodyText: nit: not from this patch, but can we document or remove this @param

In this function, we start with a list of topics and convert it to a flattened list of partitions. Ultimately in startReplicaDeletion, we end up regrouping by topic. I wonder if there is an opportunity to save a little work by avoiding the intermediate conversions.
By the way, because we are doing more batching now, this may be a good time to reduce or remove the info log line in onPartitionDeletion which can already be a bit noisy.

nodes.bodyText: I think onTopicDeletion doesn't do any filtering on partitions that are passed through to this method. Would it be simpler to skip the construction of the map and pass through the set of topics? Then we could provide a convenient accessor in ControllerContext to access the PartitionAndReplica objects by topic.
